page.title: 12PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: People in our area no longer have their own fire srevice, although there used to be a private one in bygone days. Fire tenders have to be called from the volunteer fire station in Shepton Mallet in the event of an emergency. Neither village has their own policeman anymore and are the responsability of an area policeman based in a nearby village. However he tries to retain a close relationship with his villages, in particular by visiting the schools and getting to know the children. A travelling library takes books deep into the surrounding countryside fortnightly and visiting the housebound on their route. There is only one doctor who has his surgery in Oakhill, patients of other doctors have to travel to Shepton Mallet, Chilcompton,or Midsomer Norton.
